MS.S: This module provides the ability to query the speculation control settings for the system.

## 1.0.18_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Consume the RDCL_NO flag from the Kernel_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.17_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Use FMS for L1TF detection_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.16_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fixed SBDR typo_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.15_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Add support for querying SPDR, FBSDP and PSDP mitigation settings_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.14_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Correct MDS reporting related to AMD CPUs_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.13_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Add support for querying MDS OS mitigation setting_x000D__x000A_* Correct the reporting status related to L1TF for Arm-based CPUs_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.12_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Add support for reporting the status of Windows kernel enablement of retpoline_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.11_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue where the L1TF OS mitigation was being improperly reported as enabled_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.10_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Replaced usage of Get-WmiObject with Get-CimInstance_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.9_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Added support for querying CVE-2018-3620 (L1TF OS mitigation) setting_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.8 _x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Added support for querying Speculative Store Bypass Disable (SSBD) setting _x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.7_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Added additional guidance for AMD CPUs_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.6_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Added support for querying the OS to see if KVA shadow is required_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.5_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Added -Quiet parameter which can be used to suppress host output_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.4_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Added message directing users to explanation of output _x000D__x000A_* Addressed feedback regarding multiple CPUs when setting $cpu _x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Signed files using SHA2 certificate
